target.description: The name of host or hostgroup you wish to assign to the mapping If omitted, the default hostgroup is used. If the supplied I(volume_name) is associated with a different target, it will be updated to what is supplied here.

api_username.description: The username used to authenticate against the API. This can optionally be set via an environment variable, API_USERNAME

api_password.description: The password used to authenticate against the API. This can optionally be set via an environment variable, API_PASSWORD

target_type.description: Whether the target is a host or group. Required if supplying an explicit target.

state.description: Present will ensure the mapping exists, absent will remove the mapping. All parameters I(lun), I(target), I(target_type) and I(volume_name) must still be supplied.

volume_name.description: The name of the volume you wish to include in the mapping.

api_url.description: The full API url. Example: http://ENDPOINT:8080/devmgr/v2 This can optionally be set via an environment variable, API_URL

lun.description: The LUN number you wish to give the mapping If the supplied I(volume_name) is associated with a different LUN, it will be updated to what is supplied here.
